meanings.definition: A person who takes photographs casually or without formal training.
meanings.sent1: The snapshooters captured the beautiful sunset at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends were all snapshooters, capturing memories during their trip.
meanings.sent3: The snapshooters at the party were like paparazzi, trying to get the best shots.
meanings.sent4: The snapshooters' cameras were like extensions of their eyes, always ready to capture a moment.
meanings.sent5: The snapshooters' passion for photography made them always carry their cameras around.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who take snapshots.
meanings.sent1: The snapshooters gathered at the park to take pictures of the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The snapshooters shared their snapshots from the event on social media.
meanings.sent3: The snapshooters' collection of snapshots told the story of their adventures.
meanings.sent4: The snapshooters' snapshots were like pieces of a puzzle, each one adding to the whole.
meanings.sent5: The snapshooters' snapshots captured the essence of each moment perfectly.

meanings.definition: The act of taking photographs quickly and informally.
meanings.sent1: The snapshooters hurried to capture the rainbow before it disappeared.
meanings.sent2: The snapshooters' style of snapshooting was spontaneous and candid.
meanings.sent3: The snapshooters' snapshooting skills were put to the test during the fast-paced event.
meanings.sent4: The snapshooters' snapshooting was like a race against time, trying to freeze moments in a click.
meanings.sent5: The snapshooters' snapshooting technique allowed them to capture fleeting moments effortlessly.
